name: Wiretap
ability: You are 1 of 2 Wiretap characters.

name: Domestic
ability: You start knowing 2 allied players. When they both die, you learn their characters.

name: Foreign
ability: You start knowing 2 opposite players. When you die, you learn the Evil character.

name: Double Agent
ability: The Demon sees you instead of a Minion. That Minion does not know the Evil team.

otherNightReminder: If the Sleeper was mad about their token, wake them and show them the character token of the in-play Demon.
name: Sleeper
ability: You think you are an in-play Minion. Neither of you know the Evil team. If you are “mad” about your character, you learn the in-play Demon tonight.

firstNightReminder: The Jurist points to a player. Show them their character token if they are dead or Evil, and a different token if they are alive and Good.
otherNightReminder: The Jurist points to a player. Show them their character token if they are dead or Evil, and a different token if they are alive and Good.
name: Jurist
ability: Each night, choose a player and learn their character. Good living players register falsely.

firstNightReminder: The Freelancer points to a Good character. Point to that player (arbitrary if not in play). Once per game, point falsely.
otherNightReminder: The Freelancer points to a Good character. Point to that player (arbitrary if not in play). Once per game, point falsely.
name: Freelancer
ability: Each night, choose a Good character and learn who it is (if in play). Once per game, learn falsely.

otherNightReminder: The Blacklister points to an Evil character. Show the character token of someone that Evil character whispered today. If that character is not in play, show an arbitrary token.
name: Blacklister
ability: Each night*, choose an Evil character. You learn a character they whispered today (if in play).

otherNightReminder: Nod yes or shake your head no for whether the Black Ops whispered the Demon today.
name: Black Ops
ability: Each night*, you learn whether you whispered the Demon today.

otherNightReminder: Show the character token of a player who was mad about being the Populist today.
name: Populist
ability: Each night*, you learn a character who was “mad” about being the Populist today.

name: Eavesdropper
ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn something about each player you whispered today, in no particular order.

name: Diplomat
ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to broker a deal between 2 other players (different from yesterday). Non-Travelers who break the deal today are drunk until dawn.

name: Truther
ability: If you die at night, you may guess everyone's character. You learn how many you got correct.

name: Symbologist
ability: You have 3 Townsfolk abilities, but 1 malfunctions. You also register as the functioning Townsfolk.

otherNightReminder: If the Ambassador has not used their ability, they either show a yes or no signal. If yes, they become a Traveler.
name: Ambassador
ability: You are immune to all abilities. If the Demon chooses not to act, you malfunction this game. Once per game at night*, you may become a Traveler.

otherNightReminder: Move the Drunk token to a player the holder whispered today.
name: Libertine
ability: You think you are a Townsfolk until you die, and have their аbility. Each night*, even if you are dead, the Drunk token moves to a Townsfolk the Drunk whispered today. [You start Drunk]

otherNightReminder: If no living player was mad about being the Activist today: choose a player. That player dies.
name: Activist
ability: Each night*, a player dies unless a living player was “mad” about being the Activist today, even if you are dead.

firstNightReminder: The M.A.D. Man points to a player. Move the Football token to that player.
otherNightReminder: The M.A.D. Man points to a player. Move the Football token to that player.
name: M.A.D. Man
ability: Each night, choose a living player (not yourself or Travelers): if either of you are executed tomorrow, you must ask to drop the Bomb with them.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Demon. Point to the Defector, and show them the Defector token.
name: Sympathizer
ability: A Townsfolk is Evil, but thinks they are Good. You copy their ability, and the Demon knows them. [1 Townsfolk is Evil Defector]

name: Drunk
ability: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.

name: Defector
ability: You think you are a Good Townsfolk and have their ability, but you are Evil.

firstNightReminder: The Agitprop points to a player and chooses a statement. Wake that player, show them the Mad token, and show them the statement.
otherNightReminder: The Agitprop points to a player and chooses a statement. Wake that player, show them the Mad token, and show them the statement.
name: Agitprop
ability: Each night, choose a player and a statement: that player is “mad” that statement is true tomorrow, or might be executed.

name: Brainwasher
ability: Townsfolk might receive the incorrect character in setup (their abilities work normally).

name: Templar
ability: If an Evil player nominates and executes a Good player they did not whisper today, Evil wins. Each day, if no-one dies, Evil wins.

firstNightReminder: Point to the players that are Outsiders.
otherNightReminder: If the Chairman has not used their ability, they either show a no signal, or point to an Outsider. If they do, the Outsider swaps roles and alignments with the Demon. Wake both players to inform them of their new roles and alignments.
name: Chairman
ability: You know which players are Outsiders. Once per game at night*, choose 1 to swap characters and alignments with the Demon. [-1 or +1 Outsider]

name: Comintern
ability: You know 1 Comintern and 1 Good player. Each night*, you might die. Evil wins only when no Good players live. You register as a Minion too. [Most players are Comintern]

otherNightReminder: The Draconis points to a character. If in play, those players die, and an Evil player gains their character. Wake them to inform them of their new character(s). If not in play, choose a player: they die.
name: Draconis
ability: Each night*, choose a character: if in play, they die and an Evil player gains their character(s) in addition to their own. If not, a player dies.

otherNightReminder: Answer one question about each player the Seclorum whispered today.
name: Seclorum
ability: Each night*, you may ask the Storyteller one question about each player you whispered today. Then choose a player: they die.

otherNightReminder: The Kabal points to a player and chooses a 10-word message, then points to another player: they die. Wake the first player and show them the message.
name: Kabal
ability: Each night*, send 10 words to anyone, then choose a player: they die. If an Outsider was most responsible for Good losing, they switch teams & win, unless they dropped The Bomb. [+1 Outsider]

name: Ambassador
ability: You are immune to all abilities. If the Demon chooses not to act, you malfunction this game. Once per game at night*, you may become a Traveler.

name: President
ability: Each day, you may publicly make a promise. If a player catches you breaking a promise, you can’t vote today. If none catch you, you switch teams. [No starting info]

otherNightReminder: Wake a player who was mad about everything the Celebrity said today, and show them the Celebrity token. Until dusk, they act twice.
name: Celebrity
ability: Each night*, until dusk, a player who was “mad” about everything you said today acts twice.

name: Interpol
ability: Each day, you may interrogate the players involved about any one whisper. If any are executed today, you learn whether any of them lied to you.

name: United Nations
ability: Each day, if all living players vote to ratify you, you run nominations, and you may change the nomination and voting rules, except on yourself.

otherNightReminder: The Spymaster points at any player who messaged them today. Wake the player, and show them their new character token.
name: Spymaster
ability: Each night*, players may secretly message you. Then, you may choose one who did: they change characters.

name: The Bomb
ability: If two players agree to drop the bomb, and at least one is Good, Evil wins. If Evil outnumbers Good, whoever wins, loses, and whoever loses, wins.
